casebody.data:
Wednesday, November 9, 1994

MERIT DOCKET

91-547. Baker v. Pease Co.

Certified Question of State Law, No. 893985. Sua sponte, pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XVIII(6), the court declines to answer the certified questions and dismisses this cause.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Wright, Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., would answer the certified questions. F.E. Sweeney, J., would continue the stay.
